properties.name: spring.api.version
properties.description: The version of the API. Follows the Semantic Versioning `v<major version>` format

properties.name: security.allowed-public-routes
properties.description: Public routes that are allowed to be accessed without authentication.

properties.name: security.allowed-methods
properties.description: Allowed HTTP methods for the requests

properties.name: security.allowed-headers
properties.description: Allowed HTTP headers for the requests

properties.name: security.allowed-credentials
properties.description: Whether credentials are allowed for the requests
